treatment.description: Annuals, 10–35(–40) cm. Leaves mostly opposite (distal often alternate); petioles (0–)4–11 mm; blades ovate to ovate-deltate or trullate, 1–3.5(–5) cm, margins serrate. Heads in open, lax, subcorymbiform or paniculiform (sometimes nearly cylindric) arrays. Peduncles (1–)3–10 mm, stipitate-glandular. Involucres 6–8 mm. Phyllaries stipitate- and sessile-glandular, apices acute. Corollas white, lobes sparsely hirsute. Pappi surpassing corollas. 2n = 22.
